ITEMS.title: Heidi
ITEMS.synopsis:
Orphaned at age 5, curly-haired Heidi is sent to live with her gruff recluse of a grandfather in the Swiss Alps and soon thaws his frozen heart.
New on 2017-08-05

ITEMS.title: Holes
ITEMS.synopsis:
At a Texas detention camp, delinquents are forced to dig holes every day as a character-building exercise. But what's the real reason for the digging?
New on 2017-08-05

ITEMS.title: Enter the Warriors Gate
ITEMS.synopsis:
An avid gamer is magically transported to ancient China, where he must become a warrior in order to save the princess from an evil warlord.
New on 2017-08-05

ITEMS.title: Sky on Fire
ITEMS.synopsis:
The security chief at a top-level medical facility must fight to ensure that revolutionary cancer research doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
New on 2017-08-05
